questions.question: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?

answers.answer: What would I do with 1 millions euros?

In my opinion,I think I buy a expensive car and a big house.Then,I travel around the world with my new car.I start from Louvain and I ride to the sea,I take the boat with my car to arrive in Canada.It's a beautifull land et and would like to taste the famous "sirop d'herarble canadien".After my trip in Canadia,I go to the Usa to see New-York city!I would like walk in central Park.
